author: Napoleon Hill
message: Edison failed 10,000 times before he made the electric light. Do not be discouraged if you fail a few times.
title: Thought of the day

message: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. And today? Today is a gift that's why they call it the present.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henry Thoreau
message: The only way to tell the truth is to speak with kindness. Only the words of a loving man can be heard.
title: Thought of the day

author: Benjamin Disraeli
message: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
title: Thought of the day
